title: Drawing, "Studies of arm and leg muscles"
medium: Recto and verso:  Red chalk on blue colored paper
provenance: Giovanni Piancastelli; Mrs. Edward D. Brandegee
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of various donors and from Eleanor G. Hewitt Fund
description: Drawing of the head, upper arm, and torso of Christ dead.  Above the study there are drawings of studies of hands.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Studies of arm and leg muscles".
Recto and verso:  Red chalk on blue colored paper. Museum purchase through gift of various donors and from Eleanor G. Hewitt Fund. 1938-88-8646.
